Detailed Description

Initiate WISHBONE MASTER bus cycles.

The bus_control module is the only module that has contact with signals from outside of the IP core. It is responsible for initiating WISHBONE MASTER bus cycles. The cycles can be divided into:

  • memory read cycles (supervisor data, supervisor program, user data, user program)
  • memory write cycles (supervisor data, user data),
  • interrupt acknowledge.

Every cycle is supplemented with the following tags:

  • standard WISHBONE cycle tags: SGL_O, BLK_O, RMW_O,
  • register feedback WISHBONE address tags: CTI_O and BTE_O,
  • ao68000 specific cycle tag: fc_o which is equivalent to MC68000 function codes.

The bus_control module is also responsible for registering interrupt inputs and initiating the interrupt acknowledge cycle in response to a microcode request. Microcode requests a interrupt acknowledge at the end of instruction processing, when the interrupt privilege level is higher than the current interrupt privilege mask, as specified in the MC68000 User's Manual.

Finally, bus_control controls also two ao68000 specific core outputs:

  • blocked output, high when that the processor is blocked after encountering a double bus error. The only way to leave this block state is by reseting the ao68000 by the asynchronous reset input signal.
  • reset output, high when processing the RESET instruction. Can be used to reset external devices.

Definition at line 751 of file ao68000.v.

Definition at line 880 of file ao68000.v.

 
00880 always @(posedge CLK_I or negedge reset_n) begin
00881     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00882         interrupt_mask_o <= 3'b000;
00883         last_interrupt_mask <= 3'b000;
00884     end
00885     else if(ipl_i > ipm_i && do_interrupt_i == 1'b0) begin
00886         interrupt_mask_o <= ipl_i;
00887         last_interrupt_mask <= interrupt_mask_o;
00888     end
00889     else if(do_interrupt_i == 1'b1) begin
00890         interrupt_mask_o <= last_interrupt_mask;
00891     end
00892     else begin
00893         interrupt_mask_o <= 3'b000;
00894         last_interrupt_mask <= 3'b000;
00895     end
00896 end

00944                     current_state <= S_BLOCKED;

00948                     reset_o <= 1'b1;
00949                     reset_counter <= 8'd124;
00950                     current_state <= S_RESET;
00951                 end
00952                 // read
00953                 else if(do_read_i == 1'b1) begin
00954                     WE_O <= 1'b0;

00956                     else                        fc_o <= (address_type_i == 1'b0) ? FC_USER_DATA : FC_USER_PROGRAM;
00957 
00958                     if(address_i[0] == 1'b1 && (size_i[0] == 1'b0)) begin // WORD or LONG WORD
00959                         fault_address_state_o <= address_i;
00960                         rw_state_o <= 1'b1;
00961                         fc_state_o <= (supervisor_i == 1'b1) ?  ((address_type_i == 1'b0) ? FC_SUPERVISOR_DATA : FC_SUPERVISOR_PROGRAM) :
00962                                                                 ((address_type_i == 1'b0) ? FC_USER_DATA : FC_USER_PROGRAM);
00963                         interrupt_trap_o <= VECTOR_ADDRESS_TRAP;
00964 
00965                         jmp_address_trap_o <= 1'b1;
00966                         current_state <= S_WAIT;

00977                                                                                     4'b1111;

00979

00983                             RMW_O <= 1'b1;
00984                             CTI_O <= CTI_END_OF_BURST;
00985                         end

00995                             RMW_O <= 1'b0;
00996                             CTI_O <= CTI_END_OF_BURST;
00997                         end
00998 
00999                         current_state <= S_READ_1;
01000                     end
01001                 end
01002                 // write
01003                 else if(do_write_i == 1'b1) begin
01004                     WE_O <= 1'b1;
01005                     if(supervisor_i == 1'b1)    fc_o <= FC_SUPERVISOR_DATA;
01006                     else                        fc_o <= FC_USER_DATA;
01007 
01008                     if(address_i[0] == 1'b1 && size_i[0] == 1'b0) begin // WORD or LONG WORD

01010                         rw_state_o <= 1'b0;

01025                         end

01075                     end

01079

01081                         // load 4 words: [79:16] in 2,3 cycles
01082                         prefetch_ir_valid_32_o <= 1'b0;
01083                         prefetch_ir_valid_o <= 1'b0;
01084                         prefetch_ir_valid_80_o <= 1'b0;
01085

01087                     end
01088                     else if(prefetch_ir_valid_80_o == 1'b0 && pc_change_i == 2'b01) begin
01089                         // load 2 words: [31:0] in 1 cycle
01090                         prefetch_ir_valid_32_o <= 1'b1;
01091                         prefetch_ir_valid_o <= 1'b0;
01092                         prefetch_ir_valid_80_o <= 1'b0;
01093 
01094                         prefetch_ir_o <= { prefetch_ir_o[63:0], 16'b0 };
01095                         current_state <= S_PC_0;
01096                     end
01097                     else begin
01098                         // do not load any words
01099                         prefetch_ir_valid_32_o <= 1'b1;
01100                         prefetch_ir_valid_o <= 1'b1;
01101                         prefetch_ir_valid_80_o <= 1'b0;
01102 
01103                         prefetch_ir_o <= { prefetch_ir_o[63:0], 16'b0 };
01104                     end
01105 
01106 
01107                 end
01108                 // interrupt
01109                 else if(do_interrupt_i == 1'b1) begin
01110                     CYC_O <= 1'b1;
01111                     ADR_O <= { 27'b111_1111_1111_1111_1111_1111_1111, last_interrupt_mask };
01112                     SEL_O <= 4'b1111;
01113                     STB_O <= 1'b1;
01114                     WE_O <= 1'b0;
01115 
01116                     SGL_O <= 1'b1;
01117                     BLK_O <= 1'b0;

01122 
01123                     current_state <= S_INT_1;
01124                 end
01125             end
01126 
01127             S_RESET: begin
01128                 reset_counter <= reset_counter - 8'd1;
01129 
01130                 if(reset_counter == 8'd0) begin
01131                     finished_o <= 1'b1;
01132                     current_state <= S_WAIT;
01133                 end
01134             end
01135 
01136             S_BLOCKED: begin
01137             end

01139             S_INT_1: begin

01141                     CYC_O <= 1'b0;
01142                     STB_O <= 1'b0;

01145

01147                     current_state <= S_WAIT;
01148                 end

01150                     CYC_O <= 1'b0;
01151                     STB_O <= 1'b0;
01152 
01153                     interrupt_trap_o <= 8'd24 + { 5'b0, interrupt_mask_o };
01154 
01155                     finished_o <= 1'b1;
01156                     current_state <= S_WAIT;
01157                 end
01158                 else if(ERR_I == 1'b1) begin
01159                     CYC_O <= 1'b0;
01160                     STB_O <= 1'b0;
01161 
01162                     interrupt_trap_o <= 8'd24; // spurious interrupt
01163 
01164                     finished_o <= 1'b1;
01165                     current_state <= S_WAIT;
01166                 end
01167             end
01168 
01169             S_PC_0: begin
01170                 WE_O <= 1'b0;
01171                 if(supervisor_i == 1'b1)    fc_o <= FC_SUPERVISOR_PROGRAM;
01172                 else                        fc_o <= FC_USER_PROGRAM;
01173 
01174                 if(pc_i[0] == 1'b1) begin
01175                     prefetch_ir_valid_32_o <= 1'b1;
01176                     prefetch_ir_valid_o <= 1'b1;
01177                     prefetch_ir_valid_80_o <= 1'b1;
01178 
01179                     fault_address_state_o <= pc_i;
01180                     rw_state_o <= 1'b1;
01181                     fc_state_o <= (supervisor_i == 1'b1) ? FC_SUPERVISOR_PROGRAM : FC_USER_PROGRAM;

01206                         RMW_O <= 1'b0;

01208                     end

01210                     saved_pc_change <= pc_change_i;
01211                     prefetch_ir_valid_32_o <= 1'b0;

01214                 end
01215             end
01216 
01217             S_PC_1: begin

01232                             CTI_O <= CTI_INCR_CYCLE;

01260                         end

01280                 else if(RTY_I == 1'b1) begin

01285                 end

01299             S_PC_2: begin

01305             S_PC_3: begin
01306                 if(ACK_I == 1'b1) begin
01307                     if(pc_i[1:0] == 2'b10) begin
01308                         //CYC_O <= 1'b1;

01325                     end
01326                     else begin
01327                         CYC_O <= 1'b0;
01328                         STB_O <= 1'b0;
01329 
01330                         prefetch_ir_o <= { prefetch_ir_o[79:48], DAT_I[31:0], 16'b0 };
01331 
01332                         prefetch_ir_valid_32_o <= 1'b1;
01333                         prefetch_ir_valid_o <= 1'b1;
01334                         prefetch_ir_valid_80_o <= 1'b0;
01335                         current_state <= S_INIT;
01336                     end
01337                 end
01338                 else if(RTY_I == 1'b1) begin
01339                     CYC_O <= 1'b0;
01340                     STB_O <= 1'b0;
01341 
01342                     current_state <= S_PC_4;
01343                 end
01344                 else if(ERR_I == 1'b1) begin
01345                     CYC_O <= 1'b0;
01346                     STB_O <= 1'b0;
01347 
01348                     fault_address_state_o <= { ADR_O, 2'b00 };
01349                     rw_state_o <= ~WE_O;
01350                     fc_state_o <= fc_o;
01351                     interrupt_trap_o <= VECTOR_BUS_TRAP;
01352 
01353                     jmp_bus_trap_o <= 1'b1;
01354                     current_state <= S_WAIT;
01355                 end
01356             end
01357             S_PC_4: begin

01359                 STB_O <= 1'b1;
01360 
01361                 current_state <= S_PC_3;
01362             end

01364                 if(ACK_I == 1'b1) begin
01365                     CYC_O <= 1'b0;

01402             S_READ_1: begin

01418 
01419                         data_read_o <= { DAT_I[15:0], 16'b0 };
01420 
01421                         current_state <= S_READ_2;
01422                     end
01423                     else begin
01424                         if(read_modify_write_i == 1'b1) begin
01425                             CYC_O <= 1'b1;
01426                             STB_O <= 1'b0;
01427                         end
01428                         else begin
01429                             CYC_O <= 1'b0;
01430                             STB_O <= 1'b0;
01431                         end
01432 
01433                         if(address_i[1:0] == 2'b00 && size_i[2] == 1'b1)             data_read_o <= DAT_I[31:0];
01434                         else if(address_i[1:0] == 2'b10 && size_i[1] == 1'b1)        data_read_o <= { {16{DAT_I[15]}}, DAT_I[15:0] };
01435                         else if(address_i[1:0] == 2'b00 && size_i[1] == 1'b1)        data_read_o <= { {16{DAT_I[31]}}, DAT_I[31:16] };
01436                         else if(address_i[1:0] == 2'b11 && size_i[0] == 1'b1)        data_read_o <= { {24{DAT_I[7]}}, DAT_I[7:0] };

01439                         else if(address_i[1:0] == 2'b00 && size_i[0] == 1'b1)        data_read_o <= { {24{DAT_I[31]}}, DAT_I[31:24] };
01440 
01441                         finished_o <= 1'b1;
01442                         current_state <= S_WAIT;
01443                     end
01444                 end
